full_summary:
# Government Auction: Amherstburg Canadian Coast Guard Base Wharf Phase 2 Repairs
==============================================

## Notice Information

|    **Notice/AVIS ID**    |                             **Title/Titre**                            |   **Closing/Clôture Date** |
|---------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------|
| WS3853485850              |    Amherstburg Canadian Coast Guard Base Wharf Phase 2 Repairs    |    2023-07-27              |

## Overview

This Invitation to Qualify is for the second phase of the Amherstburg Canadian Coast Guard Base Wharf repair project. The department requires a qualified contractor to renovate the Amherstburg facility in Ontario. The contractor will conduct the repairs within 24 weeks from the date of acceptance.

## Description

The scope of this project includes the repair of the Amherstburg wharf. The department has requested services for building and marine construction. Bidders with required experience and qualifications are invited to submit financial bids on the project. The issuance of this call for bids has undergone an amendment to the closing time; new bids must be submitted by July 27, 2023 at 14:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after the deadline will be considered non-responsive.

## Specifications

* Procurement category: construction services for the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Ontario.
* Type of services required: Marine and building construction
* Evaluation method: A competitive bidding process in which prospective vendors compete for this contract.
* A vendor must be approved by the government to receive the bid request.

## Bidding Terms and Conditions

* All bidders must comply with Ministry of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), procurement process
* Proof of Experience (Documentation and Certification)
* Inspection Reports Requirements (QC, Inspections Records & QA police-books &photos, inspector xf)
* Language  of bidding (English)
* Residency requirement
* On-site, supervision additional item warrants any associated logistics costs
